actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Bite attacks or one Bite attack and two Tripwire Vine attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 13 (2d8+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tripwire Vine
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 20 ft., one creature,. 7 (1d6+4) bludgeoning damage and the target must make DC 14 Str save or be knocked prone and pulled up to 15 ft. toward the tripwire patch.

reactions.name: No Escape
reactions.desc: If a prone creature within 5 ft. of patch stands up from prone patch can make one Bite vs. it.

special_abilities.name: Bountiful Death
special_abilities.desc: When the tripwire patch reduces a creature to 0 hp nearby plants erupt with growth. Plants within 20' of the body become thick overgrown difficult terrain and all plants within a 2-mile radius centered on the point where the creature was killed become enriched for 7 days for each CR of the slain creature (minimum of 7 days) cumulatively increasing in duration each time the patch kills a creature. Enriched plants yield twice the normal amount of food when harvested.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from normal patch of foliage such as flowers or bushes.
